sentences.en: "It wasn't your fault, John." — "Whose, then?"
sentences.cn: “那不是你的错，约翰。”——“那么，是谁的错呢？”

sentences.en: "Whose is this?" — "It's mine."
sentences.cn: “这是谁的？”——“是我的。”

sentences.en: football fans whose support for their team borders on idolatry
sentences.cn: 对球队几乎到了盲目崇拜地步的足球迷

sentences.en: He is a veteran parliamentarian whose views enjoy widespread respect.
sentences.cn: 他是个资深议员，其观点受到广泛尊重。

sentences.en: I can't remember whose idea it was for us to meet again.
sentences.cn: 我记不清我们再次会面是谁的主意了。

sentences.en: I wondered whose the coat was.
sentences.cn: 我不知道那是谁的外套。

sentences.en: I'm wondering whose mother she is then.
sentences.cn: 我很纳闷，那么她是谁的母亲呢？

sentences.en: It was an actor whose name escapes me for the moment.
sentences.cn: 那个男演员的名字我一时想不起来了。

sentences.en: Mr Thomas was taught by the Catholic nuns whose school he attended.
sentences.cn: 托马斯先生是在天主教修女创办的学校接受的教育。

sentences.en: Now whose go is it?
sentences.cn: 现在轮到谁了？

sentences.en: So who are your real friends and whose real friends are you?
sentences.cn: 而谁是你的真正的朋友，你又是谁的真正的朋友呢？

sentences.en: So whose party was it last night?
sentences.cn: 那么，昨晚的聚会是谁办的？

sentences.en: That’s the man whose house has burned down. ＃
sentences.cn: 就是那个男人的房子被烧毁了。

sentences.en: The gunman, whose mask had slipped, fled.
sentences.cn: 面罩掉落的持枪歹徒逃之夭夭了。

sentences.en: The word “dentist”denotes a doctor whose work is the care of teeth.
sentences.cn: “牙科医生”一词意谓其工作是医治牙齿的医生。

sentences.en: Whose car were they in?
sentences.cn: 他们坐的谁的车？

sentences.en: Whose house is that?
sentences.cn: 那是谁的房子？

sentences.en: Whose is this?
sentences.cn: 这是谁的？

sentences.en: Whose keys are those?
sentences.cn: 那些钥匙是谁的？

sentences.en: Whose turn is it to deal?
sentences.cn: 该谁发牌了？

trans.tran_en: used to ask which person or people a particular thing belongs to
used to ask which person or people a particular thing belongs to
